=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/03/27 Average Rating: 4.9 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Klein', 'Phil Churchward', 'Nigel Simpkiss', 'Richard Heeley', 'James Bryce', 'Andrew Fettis', 'Owen Trevor', 'Mark McQueen', 'Jon Richards', 'Konrad Begg'], 'Producers': ['Andy Wilman'], 'Starring': ['Jeremy Clarkson', 'Richard Hammond', 'James May'], 'Studio': ['BBC America']} Review Text: I really enjoy this program. As always, the quality and speed from Amazon is awesome. If you're a top gear fan, this is a must see! This particular episode was hilarious. Review Title: Great program Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/11/19 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Dan Scanlon'], 'Producers': ['Kori Rae'], 'Starring': ['Billy Crystal', 'John Goodman', 'Steve Buscemi'], 'Studio': ['Pixar']} Review Text: It was good, not as good as the first Monsters Inc., movie, but good. The movie is entirely placed when the monsters were in school. The quality is awesome and it's worth watching, but be prepared for an understated plot. I would like to have seen more ties to their work after school and getting hired. This flew by in about a 30 second window in this movie. Review Title: Not as good as the first one... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/04/07 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Matthew Vaughn'], 'Producers': ['Stephen Marks', 'Peter Morton', 'David Womark', 'Matthew Vaughn', 'Lorenzo Di Bonaventura', 'Michael Dreyer', 'Neil Gaiman'], 'Starring': ['Claire Danes', 'Charlie Cox', 'Sienna Miller']} Review Text: I enjoyed the setting and plot of this movie. Of course, in the end, we knew the hero would make it. There were some other surprising plot twists that I hadn't expected. It was an enjoyable find.

If you like movies that contain magic, witches, and some humor, you will probably enjoy this movie. Review Title: Surprisingly good find.... Review Title: I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Star Trek: The Next Generation: Season 5 Review Date: 2015/05/12 Store: Patrick Stewart (Actor), Jonathan Frakes (Actor) Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, TV Product Description: ['STAR TREK: THE NEXT GENERATION SEASON FIVE never looked more stunning than it does on Blu-ray with 1080p high definition picture. Experience enhanced visual effects rebuilt from the original elements and surround yourself with the digitally remastered 7.1 sound (or choose the original broadcast audio). You\'ll feel like you\'re plunged into the 24th century for some of the series\' most thrilling moments, including the epic two-part episode "Unification" as Capt. Picard (Patrick Stewart) pursues a rogue Ambassador Spock (Leonard Nimoy) into enemy Romulan territory. Discover all-new, never-before-seen bonus features as you join the USS Enterprise on the ultimate voyage.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'Box set, Full Screen, Subtitled', 'Contributor': 'Jonathan Frakes, Patrick Stewart, Brent Spiner', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '6', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28121246', 'Media Format': 'Box set, Full Screen, Subtitled', 'Run time': '19 hours and 42 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 19, 2016', 'Actors': 'Patrick Stewart, Jonathan Frakes, Brent Spiner', 'Subtitles': 'French, English', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '6'} Review Text: t's incredible to see these in HD for the first time. I have the entire series and going through it in HD was like watching it all again for the first time. The quality is incredible. I definitely recommend these and watching the whole series again on Blu Ray! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mighty Ships Review Date: 2015/09/14 Categories: Documentary, Special Interest Product Description: ['These massive, high-tech vessels prove to the world each day that sometimes bigger is indeed better.'] Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available']} Review Text: This really had a lot of fun information. I enjoyed watching it. If you want to know about ships and how things work, this is a great series! Review Title: Good information and fun to watch! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: C.H.i.P.s. Review Date: 2015/09/16 Categories: Adventure, Action Product Description: ['Get your motor running ... head out on the highway ... and gear up for\'70s-era action adventures with CHiPs! Starring Erik Estrada and Larry Wilcox as California Highway Patrol officers Frank "Ponch" Poncharello and Jonathan "Jon" Baker, this high-speed series features these chopper coppers as they ride the L.A. freeways, chase down criminals and still find time to unwind with laughs and good times.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Phil Bondelli', 'John Florea', 'Gordon Hessler', 'Barry Crane', 'Leslie H. Martinson', 'Don Weis', 'Charles Bail', 'Michael Caffey', 'Bruce Kessler', 'Georg Fenady'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Larry Wilcox', 'Erik Estrada', 'Robert Pine']} Review Text: I've always been a big fan of CHiPS. To get to see it in high-def has been awesome and I've enjoyed it on Amazon. You can get the DVD a little cheaper than the streaming, but if you want HD, this is the only way to get it! Definitely recommend it! Review Title: Great quality, one of my all-time favorite classics! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Airplane! Review Date: 2016/06/06 Categories: Comedy, Nail-Biting, Strange, Understated Product Description: ['After the pilots of a commercial airline fall sick, a man who is afraid of flying must ensure that the plane lands safely.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jim Abrahams', 'David Zucker', 'Jerry Zucker'], 'Producers': ['Jon Davison', 'Howard W. Koch Jr.', 'Howard W. Koch'], 'Starring': ['Robert Hays', 'Julie Hagerty', 'Leslie Nielson']} Review Text: What can I say, it's Airplane! One of the funniest corny comedies ever made. It's a must see! Review Title: Hillarious Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Great Food Truck Race Review Date: 2016/10/24 Categories: Unscripted, Special Interest Product Description: ['Each week, food truck teams roll into a new city and spend a frantic weekend competing to see which group can sell the most food. The last team standing wins the $50,000 grand prize.'] Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Patrick Higgins', 'Brock Isbell', 'Matthew W. Davis', 'Colin Donahue'], 'Producers': ['Joe Burk', 'Tom Forman', 'Ashley Adelman', 'Dean Ollins', 'Peter Woronov', 'Brad Bishop']} Review Text: If you like the "reality" type programs, this is a great program. I have watched almost all seasons and enjoy seeing the teams compete. I wish there were more information on how the teams did after the show, but that would probably be a whole new program they'd have to put together at a later time. Definitely recommend this series. Review Title: Great series and fun competition Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2016/10/24 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Adam Dubrowa'], 'Producers': ['Thom Beers', 'Rob Stacey', 'Philip David Segal', 'Jeff Conroy', 'Brandon Killion', 'Travis Shakespeare', 'Ben Swinehart', 'Mitchell Tanen', 'Decker Watson']} Review Text: I have enjoyed watching the show since the series started years ago. I wound up purchasing the season on Amazon because the guide was messed up on my cable and it didn't record. The quality of the video is excellent and it's fun and a bit nerve racking to watch the trucks cross the ice. A fun cast makes this a great series to watch! Review Title: Great series Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2017/01/24 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Eric Weingrad', 'Brian Thompson'], 'Producers': ['Eric Weingrad', 'Vincent Lopez', 'Jason King', 'Tim Evans', 'Lisa Sichi', 'Matthew Weil', 'Emily Campbell', 'Douglas Cohen', 'Joel Franklin']} Review Text: One of my favorite programs. These guys are funny and it's amazing to watch some of the stuff they engineer. I wish they were still on the air, but going back to these episodes on Amazon video is a great way to catch up on what you missed. I recommend this program, it's great entertainment. Review Title: Hillarious and fun to watch Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2018/01/08 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeremiah Chechik'], 'Producers': ['William S. Beasley', 'Mauri Syd Gayton', 'Daniel Grodnik', 'John Hughes', 'Tom Jacobson', 'Matty Simmons', 'Ramey E. Ward'], 'Starring': ['Chevy Chase', "Beverly D'Angelo", 'Juliette Lewis'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: Like all of the movies in the National Lampoon series, Christmas Vacation is hilarious. Chevy Chase does a great job in this movie. It's a classic for our family to watch every holiday season. If you've never seen this, you are really missing out on one of the funniest and most festive Christmas movies ever produced. Review Title: One of the best Christmas movies ever Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Mighty Cruise Ships Review Date: 2018/01/08 Categories: Documentary Product Description: ['From a Viking longship to the biggest cruise ship in history, embark on all new adventures in our brand-new season.'] Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Davidson', 'Peter Findlay', 'Mark Stevenson', 'Herrie Tencate', 'Peter Gombos'], 'Producers': ['Smithsonian Channel']} Review Text: I have really enjoyed the Mighty Cruise Ships series. I love the ocean and ships in general. You get a lot of information from this series about how cruise's operate and how the ships are designed. I have really enjoyed watching the series and seeing the differences in different cruise operators, destinations, and types of passengers that sail on the various vessels. If you are a cruise and/or ship guru, you will appreciate this series. Review Title: Great information and cruise following Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Star Trek: Voyager: The Complete Series Review Date: 2018/08/17 Store: Kate Mulgrew (Actor), Robert Beltran (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Subtitled, Dolby, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Kate Mulgrew, McNeill, Ethan Phillips, Robert Beltran, Robert Duncan, Roxann Dawson', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '47', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.71 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Subtitled, Dolby, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Release date': 'March 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Kate Mulgrew, Robert Beltran, Ethan Phillips, Robert Duncan, McNeill', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Number of discs': '47'} Review Text: I have always been a Star Trek fan. After TNG, I never really got into Deep Space Nine. What I liked about Voyager is the similarity to TNG, with them being on a ship and exploring. I wish they would release this on blu-ray, although it sounds like that probably won't happen. The DVD box set is the next best thing and I am happy to have it and watch the series regularly. Review Title: Great Program Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Star Trek: The Original Series: The Complete Series Review Date: 2018/08/17 Store: William Shatner (Actor), Leonard Nimoy (Actor) Rated: NR Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray Product Description: ['Complete Series'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'Widescreen, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, Subtitled, Box set', 'Contributor': 'William Shatner, James Doohan, Leonard Nimoy', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '20', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35386474', 'Media Format': 'Widescreen, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, Subtitled, Box set', 'Release date': 'June 14, 2016', 'Actors': 'William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, James Doohan', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English, Portuguese', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Number of discs': '20'} Review Text: I love the video quality in this set. It was re-mastered to HD and offers you the option of the enhanced effects or the original effects. All are in superb HD quality and stunning to watch. Rewatching the series from these blu-ray discs is like watching it over again from the start. There are so many details you wouldn't notice from the old SD version. I highly recommend these for any Star Trek fan! Review Title: Awesome Quality Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**User Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Strong Enthusiasm for Sci-Fi**: Consistent purchases of the *Star Trek* series (TNG, Voyager, Original Series) indicate a deep appreciation for science fiction, particularly works that feature exploration and space themes.
  
- **Taste for Comedic Content**: Regular purchases of comedy films, especially those involving Chevy Chase and classic series, reveal a preference for light-hearted, humorous entertainment.

- **High-Quality Viewing**: The user values high definition and improved visual quality, as noted in reviews of remastered series. They express satisfaction with Blu-ray formats, indicating a trend toward premium viewing experiences.

- **Interest in Family-Friendly and Animated Movies**: Engagement with films from Pixar and nostalgic titles suggests an affinity for animated content, highlighting a blend of child-friendly themes with humor.

- **Documentary and Reality TV Enthusiasm**: The user also explores documentary series focused on ships and food, reflecting curiosity about real-world topics and competitions, marking a diverse interest in genres beyond scripted content.

- **Positive Engagement with Content**: Generally high ratings (mostly 4.7-5.0) across diverse genres reinforce a pattern of delighted engagement, showcasing consistent satisfaction with purchases and a reliable appreciation for quality storytelling.

**Overall**, their purchasing behavior showcases a blend of science fiction nostalgia, comedic taste, family-friendly preferences, and a penchant for high-quality visual experiences.

target_interaction.title: Just OK
target_interaction.text: It was worth watching, but I really miss the comedy that used to be incorporated into these.  This one just wasn't as good as some of their past work.
